name: OpenSSL-Apple
summary: A script for compiling OpenSSL for Apple Devices
prepare_command:
./build-libssl.sh --version="1.1.1h" --targets="ios-sim-cross-x86_64 ios-sim-cross-arm64 ios64-cross-arm64 ios64-cross-arm64e macos64-x86_64 macos64-arm64 mac-catalyst-x86_64 mac-catalyst-arm64"
./create-openssl-framework.sh dynamic
